TEXT.TITLE: CAE <CAE.TO> UNIT WINS LUFTHANSA CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: CAE Electronics Inc, wholly-owned by Cae Industries Ltd, said it received a contract worth nine mln Canadian dlrs to design and manufacture an A-320 aircraft flight simulator for Lufthansa German Airlines. It said the simulator is scheduled for delivery in late 1989. Reuter
